EXPERT UPHOLSTERY WORKS LLC

Our mission is to deliver the highest quality upholstery.

Learn More

About Expert Holstery

For Quality Automotive, Marine ,Residential and commercial Upholstery

Expert Upholstery Works have been providing quality automotive and boat upholstery services to sacramento since 2020. With over one thousand satisfied customers and a dedicated team of expert craftsmen, we’re proud to be among the best in the business.

Our experienced team have a meticulous eye for detail and a high level of craftsmanship – because we know that your classic or custom car, boat or RV are your pride and joy. From a simple repair job , through to an extensive restoration project, we offer a professional, personal service and take old fashioned pride in a job well done.
